p: Sampling site: Serra dos Órgãos National Park, Teresópolis municipality, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The biotope is soil with a litter of high altitude vegetation on rocky Southeastern Brazil mountains; also known as the Brazilian Páramos. Queiroz, G.C. leg. 14.iii. 2012. Altitude: 2129 m above sea level. Local coordinates: 22°27'31.21"S 43°1'43.21"W. Collections were performed under license MMA-ICMBio-SISBIO number 25054–3.
